Name: Percentage of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation occurrences across all cases
Metric: Number of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities

Name: Percentage of variants that contain First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation
Metric: Percentage of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all cases

Name: Number of times First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation is immediately followed by Awaiting Assignment to Batch
Metric: Number of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities for cases where activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' occurs

Name: Percentage of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation that occurs after RW-EIC Accept
Metric: Percentage of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'RW-EIC Accept'

Name: Frequency of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation relative to Manuscript Export Succeeded
Metric: Number of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities for cases where activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' occurs

Name: Percentage of cases where First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation appears more than once
Metric: the average of the function base > 1 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Number of variants in which First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation directly follows First Look-Your updates are overdue
Metric: Number of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities for cases where activity 'First Look-Your updates are overdue' occurs

Name: Percentage of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation events that occur within accepted revision pathways (i.e., those ending in RW-EIC Accept or SW-EIC Accept)
Metric: Percentage of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'RW-EIC Accept'

Name: Frequency of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation compared to Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation
Metric: Number of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities for cases where activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' occurs

Name: Number of times First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation is preceded by First Look-Please submit updates
Metric: Number of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities for cases where activity 'First Look-Please submit updates' occurs

Name: Percentage of all revision-related activities that culminate in First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation
Metric: Percentage of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation in cases that eventually reach Awaiting Assignment to Batch
Metric: Number of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities for cases where activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' occurs

Name: Ratio of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation to Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation across the entire log
Metric: Number of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities for cases where activity 'Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation' occurs

Name: Percentage of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation that is part of a re-submission loop involving RW–Major Revision due in 1 week or RW–Minor Revision due in 1 week
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'count': activity == 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation'", 'metric_condition': '> 0', 'aggregation': 'percentage', 'filter': "activity in ['RW–Major Revision due in 1 week', 'RW–Minor Revision due in 1 week']"}"
